comments.body: Maybe introduce a SqsSettings class for this now that the parameter list has become so long?

SInce this is the builder for just such a settings class (`SqsSourceSettings`), I am not sure if there would be a benefit. There is default parameters on the scala side, and shorter overloads for java users, after all.
Aah, sorry, it's morning and I'm not quite awake yet so I read it as the constructor of the stage. NVM that comment. :)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +31,35 @@             attributeNames: util.List[AttributeName],
             messageAttributeNames: util.List[MessageAttributeName],
             closeOnEmptyReceive: Boolean): SqsSourceSettings =
    SqsSourceSettings(waitTimeSeconds,
                      maxBufferSize,
